headline: PayPal Plunges 23.3% in 3 Months: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: PYPL shares slide 23.3% in three months as competition, tariffs and higher expenses bite. Yet new platforms, AI commerce and Venmo growth provide relief.

headline: Verizon Reports Earnings. 4 Reasons the Stock Is Rising Sharply.
summary: The wireless carrier posts better-than-expected earnings and adds more postpaid customers than expected in the fourth quarter.

headline: SoFi Posts Better-Than-Expected-Earnings. The Fourth Quarter Was ‘Exceptional,’ Says CEO.
summary: SoFi has steadily expanded its offerings in crypto and self-directed investing in its bid to become a ‘one-stop shop’ for customers.

headline: Visa Crypto Chief Bets on Stablecoin Settlement as Transaction Volumes Surge
summary: Visa Inc (NYSE:V) is doubling down on stablecoin settlement infrastructure as transaction volumes surge across digital dollar networks. The payment giant’s crypto chief is positioning the company to capture settlement fees from the explosive growth in blockchain-based payments, a strategic bet that could redefine how money moves across borders. Tether’s USDT network processed 1.5 billion ... Visa Crypto Chief Bets on Stablecoin Settlement as Transaction Volumes Surge

headline: PayPal Text Payments Partnership Highlights Undervalued Opportunity For Routine Transactions
summary: PayPal Holdings (NasdaqGS:PYPL) and Venmo are partnering with Authvia to enable instant payments directly through SMS and rich messaging. The collaboration extends PayPal and Venmo usage into billing, service industries, and call centers without requiring apps or web portals. The integration uses secure, real time wallet recognition to let consumers and businesses complete transactions inside text threads. For you as an investor, this move taps into a large part of the payments market that...
